group_1.textRight: ...Whew...Since we've gotten this far away,@we should be safe for the time being...
Momoko, are you okay...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you going to try to catch me@by pretending to escape upstairs...?

group_1.textRight: Are you, perhaps, suspicious of me...?

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi looked sane at first glance...

group_1.textRight: ...Ahh, that's right...
Look.

group_1.textLeft: Bite marks...!

group_1.textRight: Since it was Kanagi, I was caught off guard...
I was bitten, but as you can see, I'm sane...
For now, anyway...

group_1.textLeft: For, now...

group_1.textRight: Eventually, I will become the same as everyone else...
So while I'm still sane, I must leave this to Momoko.
Please believe me, Momoko...!

group_1.textLeft: ...I understand, I'll believe you.

group_1.textRight: ...Momoko.

group_1.textLeft: So, what did you want to leave with me?

group_1.textRight: You may have already noticed, but...
Kanagi is being influenced by a Witch.
Everyone that has been bitten by Kanagi@has gone crazy.

group_1.textLeft: That's what it looked like...

group_1.textRight: So, I must ask Momoko to return everyone's sanity.
Right now you're the only one who can make this happen...

group_1.textLeft: I get it, but is there a way to return their sanity?
I hate to put it this way, but the way they're not responding, they're like zombies...

group_1.textRight: It'll be okay.
In an ironic twist, and thanks to being bitten,
I figured out the Witch's magic pattern@based on Kanagi's magic.
Thus, I can adjust you so that@you're able to counteract it.
...It's only temporary,@but it should last until we resolve this situation.

group_1.textLeft: You mean,@"the power to return everyone's sanity" ...?

group_1.textRight: To make this easy to understand...@let's call it "prayer power."
You are a Sister, after all.

group_1.textLeft: ..."Prayer power".@Well, it's easy to understand, but...

group_1.textRight: Now then, this will be rough since it's an@impromptu adjustment, but endure it, alright?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Here we go, then...@Close your eyes...relax your body...

group_1.textLeft: Uu...ah...

group_1.textRight: ...It's a success.
If you impart your magic power into them while strongly wishing for them to return to normal,
you can bring back everyone@that has lost their sanity from being bitten.
Kanagi should also regain her sanity...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: Ah, right, right...@You'll have to concentrate.
It would be a good idea to stop them@from moving first...

group_1.textLeft: Eh, but they were barrelin' right at me@even while I attacked, though...?

group_1.textRight: Your attacks are more effective now,@so they should stagger at least a little.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Gh...

group_1.textLeft: Coordinator!?

group_1.textRight: Also...
Since this was a rushed adjustment,
this "prayer power" will be a burden for Momoko.
Don't overuse it...

group_1.textLeft: ...Got it, I'll try not to use it too much.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm really sorry I can't go with you.

group_1.textLeft: You've done enough, Coordinator.@For the rest, just leave it to me.

group_1.textRight: ...Huhu. Such a handsome Sister...â™ª

group_1.textLeft: If you got enough energy to be making jokes,@you'll be okay.
I'll be back.

group_1.textRight: ...Right, be careful.
I beg of you, Momoko...
